title: World Affairs - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/17/22
itunes:title: World Affairs - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/17/22
description:
George Noory and Professor Michael Klare discuss the continuing unrest and upheaval around the world today, including the escalation of the war in Ukraine and Vladimir Putin's threat to use nuclear weapons, as well as rising tensions between China and Taiwan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
